company.name: string, name of company (automatically picked in /config/config.json)
company.phone: string, phone number of company (with area code: `+00`) (automatically picked in /config/config.json)
company.address: string, physical address of company (automatically picked in /config/config.json)

product.name: Product name (ie: Mailing App) (automatically picked in /config/config.json)

content: string, minified html content (automatically generated from `contents/{selected-template-name}/index.html`)
